Body:
src = tests.any_test_help.get_random_dir_in_tmp() + '.json'
with open(src, 'w+') as output:
    subprocess.check_call(['python3', '-m', 'oval_graph.command_line',
        'arf-to-json', '--all', 'tests/test_data/ssg-fedora-ds-arf.xml',
        '.'], stdout=output)
with open(src, 'r') as f:
    rules = json.load(f)
assert len(rules.keys()) == 184
out_dir = tests.any_test_help.get_random_dir_in_tmp()
subprocess.check_call(['python3', '-m', 'oval_graph.command_line',
    'json-to-graph', src, '.', '--off-web-browser', '--all', '-o', out_dir])
assert len(os.listdir(out_dir)) == 184
